data.text: Awurade, woahwehwɛ me mu
Wunim mʼasetena ne me sɔre;
Wunim mʼadifi ne me nnae mu;
Ansa na mebue mʼano akasa no
Woakata me ho nyinaa ahyia
Saa nimdeɛ yi yɛ me nwonwa dodo,
Ɛhe na metumi afi wo honhom anim akɔ?
Sɛ meforo soro a, wowɔ hɔ.
Sɛ mede adekyee ntaban tu
mpo hɔ na wo nsa begya me akɔ,
Na meka se, “Ampa ara sum mmɛkata me so
sum mpo nyɛ sum mma wo;
Na wo na wobɔɔ me honhom
Mekamfo wo, efisɛ woyɛɛ me anwonwakwan so a ɛyɛ hu;
Wɔamfa me bɔbea anhintaw wo
wʼani huu me, bere a meyɛ mogyatɔw no.
Onyankopɔn, wo nsusuwii som bo ma me!
Sɛ mise mɛkan a,
Sɛ anka, Onyankopɔn, wubekunkum amumɔyɛfo ɛ!
Wɔde adwemmɔne ka wo ho asɛm;
Awurade, metan wɔn a wɔtan wo,
Minni hwee sɛ ɔtan a mewɔ ma wɔn;
Hwehwɛ me mu, Onyankopɔn, na hu me koma;
Hwɛ sɛ bɔne bi wɔ me mu a,
